attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should we get him sacked?
Rising fuel costs?
Too many ilegal immigrants being let into the country?
Expensive Road Tax? (Still pot holes and road charges)
Food Tax?

Bloody tax on everything this country is a joke since he took over no wonder he wont hold an election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
